attributes.action: Consider removing John Bercow from office for outspoken comments about Trump
attributes.background: Commons Speaker John Bercow should be ousted after his outspoken comments about Donald Trump. Bercow stood up in parliament for two and a half minutes explaining to MPs why he would oppose any proposal to invite Donald Trump to address parliament. This undermines his supposedly neutral role.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what action you would like Parliament to take. If you would like the House of Commons to debate a vote of no confidence in the Speaker, you could sign the petition below:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183279
